text.headline: (blip timeline)
text.text: A brief tour of our long past, weird present, and distant future

text.headline: Homo sapiens
text.text: The first modern humans appear on planet Earth, including your great-great-great-(x15,000)-grandparents.

text.headline: Agriculture + civilization
text.text: Humans start cultivating crops, storing surplus, and living in permanent settlements

text.headline: Internet invented
text.text: An important leap forward in cat picture sharing technology.

text.headline: Smartphone invented
text.text: Humans get serious about the whole 'staring at screens all day' thing.

text.headline: You are here
text.text: Welcome to the present moment. (It is what it is.)

text.headline: Distant future
text.text: In another 300,000 years, will we still grow food? Work in factories? Stare at phones all day? What do we *want* to do?
